data.message:
It's my your BDay today. 
Here is a shout out to what you taught me: 
Be proud of who you are. 
Never give up. 
Don't be too cocky. 
Don't disrespect your mom. 
Don't quit. 
Always be up for the moment. 
Never be scared of trying something that you 
don't fit in. 
Always live in the moment. 
Never diss your close ones. 
FAMILY always comes FIRST. 
Thank you Em. 
Thank you for teaching me valuable lessons. 
Thank you for giving me something to stand for. 
Although you probably won't even read this, but I will take my chances.
Here is just another STAN. 
Just another kid who is a fan. 
I will always remember you. 
<3
